main event: Witnesses reported seeing a bright, circular object in the sky over Livonia, Michigan on February 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was first seen moving in a north-south direction, then stopped and hovered, before moving in an east-west direction and disappearing.
The object appeared to be round and had a bright light in the center, but made no sound.
Multiple witnesses, including two adults and two children, reported the sighting.
Some objects were seen hovering, while others were moving at a high rate of speed.
The objects were described as circular in shape and emitting a bright white light.
